about_the_game:
Forget about fussing with formats: convert your videos, music, and images from and to any format in the blink of an eye. Compress large videos with no loss of quality to save space on your hard drive. Easily find and add subtitles for your favorite flicks. Upscale the resolution of your videos with AI to enjoy them on bigger screens.

Convert any format in a snap
Movavi Video Converter seamlessly manages video, audio, and images across formats like MP4, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, WMV; MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, AAC; JPG, PNG, GIF, RAW, and more. Just drop your files into the app, choose the output format, and get the perfect result at a superspeed! Select a preset to convert files for any specific device – smartphone, tablet, e-book, or TV.


Edit your files
Instantly enhance your videos in the built-in editor: trim, crop, and rotate clips, adjust colors, add watermarks and even visual effects.

Compress large videos
Upload to online platforms faster and save space on your hard drive. Reduce file size in a flash with no loss of quality. You’ll see the estimated output size as you adjust the settings, so you can decide how much compression to apply.

Upscale your content with AI
Keep your videos sharp and view them on larger screens. Make your vids’ resolution up to 8 times better with the AI-powered upscaler: drag and drop lower-quality video to the app and let AI do the rest.



Add subtitles
Easily find the subtitles for your favorite movies and shows online from right within the app. Adjust the font, size, style, and color of the subtitles to suit your needs.
detailed_description:
The New Video Suite 2024 Is Here to Save the Day!


About the Software

Forget about fussing with formats: convert your videos, music, and images from and to any format in the blink of an eye. Compress large videos with no loss of quality to save space on your hard drive. Easily find and add subtitles for your favorite flicks. Upscale the resolution of your videos with AI to enjoy them on bigger screens.

Convert any format in a snap
Movavi Video Converter seamlessly manages video, audio, and images across formats like MP4, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, WMV; MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, AAC; JPG, PNG, GIF, RAW, and more. Just drop your files into the app, choose the output format, and get the perfect result at a superspeed! Select a preset to convert files for any specific device – smartphone, tablet, e-book, or TV.


Edit your files
Instantly enhance your videos in the built-in editor: trim, crop, and rotate clips, adjust colors, add watermarks and even visual effects.

Compress large videos
Upload to online platforms faster and save space on your hard drive. Reduce file size in a flash with no loss of quality. You’ll see the estimated output size as you adjust the settings, so you can decide how much compression to apply.

Upscale your content with AI
Keep your videos sharp and view them on larger screens. Make your vids’ resolution up to 8 times better with the AI-powered upscaler: drag and drop lower-quality video to the app and let AI do the rest.



Add subtitles
Easily find the subtitles for your favorite movies and shows online from right within the app. Adjust the font, size, style, and color of the subtitles to suit your needs.
name: Movavi Video Converter 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Need to convert media files fast? Here's your go-to converter for changing video, audio, and image file formats in a flash. Take advantage of the 180+ formats for conversion to ensure your files can be used on any device. Effortlessly improve the quality of your media with powerful AI tools.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
